Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the projected revenue from the Mayweather/Pacquiao fight by stating that it is larger than the annual GDP of 29 different countries.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it does not provide any evidence or sources to back up the statement.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that there are only six countries with an annual GDP of less than $400 million, according to the World Bank.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the projected revenue from the fight can be directly compared to the annual GDP of countries, which may not be an accurate or relevant comparison.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations for the claim, such as misinterpretation of data or misinformation from the event organizers.
